title: Table Cover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: patchwork of techniques including needlework on knotted net, bobbin and needle lace
description: Squares with animals and grotesque figures alternate with squares of fabric with cutwork and needlework filling put together to form a checkerboard pattern. Deep scallop of bobbin lace on the border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, 19th century.Medium: linen
Technique: patchwork of techniques including needlework on knotted net, bobbin and needle lace. 1974-8-3.
